blocks.name: csx
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the product sigma-algebra operation.

blocks.name: diff.csx.s
diff.csx.c
diff.csx.w
df-sx
blocks.content: Define the product sigma-algebra operation, analogous to ~ df-tx . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-sx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(csx, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-sx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  âŠ¢ sX =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(sigaGen ` ran((s2 âˆˆ s0, s3 âˆˆ s1 â†¦(s2 Ã— s3)))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: sxval
blocks.content: Value of the product sigma-algebra operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, csx, c2), cfv(csigagen, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6eqr(co(c0, csx, c2), cfv(csigagen, c4), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, csx, c2), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, csx, cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  fveq2d(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqidd(cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqidd(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  rneqd(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs1), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  eqidd(c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  eqidd(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-sx(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  fvex(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  fveq2i(csigagen, c4, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c3)â†’(c0[sX]c2)=(sigaGen ` c4))
  âŠ£ c4 = ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6eqr((c0[sX]c2), (sigaGen ` c4), (sigaGen ` ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))), (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c3))
  syl2an(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âˆˆ c3, (c0[sX]c2)=(sigaGen ` ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, csx, (sigaGen ` ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))), (sigaGen ` ran((s0 âˆˆ hs0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))), (sigaGen ` ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))))
  fveq2d(csigagen, ran((s0 âˆˆ hs0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1))), ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1))), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((s0 âˆˆ hs0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)), (s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)), hs0 = c0)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, (s0 Ã— s1), c0, hs1, (s0 Ã— s1), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  eqidd(hs1, hs0 = c0)
  eqidd((s0 Ã— s1), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(csigagen, ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1))), ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1))), hs1 = c2)
  rneqd((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ hs1 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)), (s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)), hs1 = c2)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, c0, hs1, (s0 Ã— s1), c0, c2, (s0 Ã— s1), hs1 = c2)
  eqidd(c0, hs1 = c2)
  id(hs1 = c2)
  eqidd((s0 Ã— s1), hs1 = c2)
  df-sx(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  fvex(csigagen, ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1))))
  fveq2i(csigagen, c4, ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((sigaGen ` ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((sigaGen ` ran((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c2 â†¦(s0 Ã— s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sxsiga
blocks.content: A product sigma-algebra is a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sxsiga(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))), wcel(co(c0, csx, c1), cuni(crn(csiga))))
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))), wcel(co(c0, csx, c1), cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(co(c0, csx, c1), cfv(csiga, cuni(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, csx, c1), cfv(csiga, cuni(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))))
  sxval(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(crn(csiga)), c1, cuni(crn(csiga)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))), wcel(cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(csiga, cuni(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), universe))
  txbasex(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(crn(csiga)), c1, cuni(crn(csiga)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  sigagensiga(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), universe)
  elrnsiga(co(c0, csx, c1), cuni(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sxsiga(class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra))â†’(c0[sX]c1)âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra))
} = {
  syl((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)), (c0[sX]c1)âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), (c0[sX]c1)âˆˆ(sigAlgebra ` â‹ƒ ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))))
  eqeltrd((c0[sX]c1), (sigAlgebra ` â‹ƒ ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))), (sigaGen ` ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))), (c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)))
  sxval(hs0, hs1, c0, â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), c1, â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))))
  syl((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)), (sigaGen ` ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))))âˆˆ(sigAlgebra ` â‹ƒ ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))), ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  txbasex(hs0, hs1, c0, â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), c1, â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))))
  eqid(ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))))
  sigagensiga(ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))), universe)
  elrnsiga((c0[sX]c1), â‹ƒ ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: sxsigon
blocks.content: A product sigma-algebra is a sigma-algebra on the product of the bases. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sxsigon(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))), wcel(co(c0, csx, c1), cfv(csiga, cxp(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)))))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))), wcel(co(c0, csx, c1), cfv(csiga, cxp(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)))), wcel(co(c0, csx, c1), cuni(crn(csiga))), wceq(cxp(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), cuni(co(c0, csx, c1))))
  sxsiga(c0, c1)
  syl6reqr(cxp(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), cuni(co(c0, csx, c1)), cuni(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))))
  eqtrd(cuni(co(c0, csx, c1)), cuni(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cuni(cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))))
  unieqd(co(c0, csx, c1), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))))
  sxval(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(crn(csiga)), c1, cuni(crn(csiga)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)))), wceq(cuni(cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), cuni(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), universe), wcel(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), universe))
  mpt2exga(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(crn(csiga)), c1, cuni(crn(csiga)), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  rnexg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), universe)
  unisg(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), universe)
  txuni2(hs0, hs1, cuni(c0), cuni(c1), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), c0, c1)
  eqid(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  issgon(co(c0, csx, c1), cxp(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c1))
}

thm sxsigon(class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra))â†’(c0[sX]c1)âˆˆ(sigAlgebra `(â‹ƒ c0 Ã— â‹ƒ c1)))
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)), (c0[sX]c1)âˆˆ(sigAlgebra `(â‹ƒ c0 Ã— â‹ƒ c1)), (c0[sX]c1)âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), (â‹ƒ c0 Ã— â‹ƒ c1)= â‹ƒ(c0[sX]c1))
  sxsiga(c0, c1)
  syl6reqr((â‹ƒ c0 Ã— â‹ƒ c1), â‹ƒ(c0[sX]c1), â‹ƒ ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))), (c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)))
  eqtrd(â‹ƒ(c0[sX]c1), â‹ƒ ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))), â‹ƒ(sigaGen ` ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))), (c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)))
  unieqd((c0[sX]c1), (sigaGen ` ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))), (c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)))

  3syl((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)), â‹ƒ(sigaGen ` ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))))= â‹ƒ ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))), (hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))âˆˆ ğ•Œ, ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)))âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  mpt2exga(hs0, hs1, c0, â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), c1, â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), (hs0 Ã— hs1))
  rnexg((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1)), universe)
  unisg(ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))), universe)
  txuni2(hs0, hs1, â‹ƒ c0, â‹ƒ c1, ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))), c0, c1)
  eqid(ran((hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦(hs0 Ã— hs1))))
  eqid(â‹ƒ c0)
  eqid(â‹ƒ c1)
  issgon((c0[sX]c1), (â‹ƒ c0 Ã— â‹ƒ c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

}

blocks.name: sxuni
blocks.content: The base set of a product sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: elsx
blocks.content: The cartesian product of two open sets is an element of the product sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elsx(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c5, c2))), wcel(cxp(c4, c5), co(c0, csx, c2)))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cxp(c4, c5), co(c0, csx, c2), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c5, c2))))

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), universe))
  txbasex(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  sssigagen(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), universe)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(cxp(c4, c5), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(cxp(c4, c5), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  mp3an3(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c5, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wceq(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(c4, c5)))
  eqid(cxp(c4, c5))
  rspc2ev(hs0, hs1, c4, c0, c5, c2, wceq(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(c4, c5)), wceq(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(c4, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq2d(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  xpeq1(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))
  eqeq2d(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(c4, cv(hs1)), cxp(c4, c5), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))
  xpeq2(cv(hs1), c5, c4)
  syl(wa(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c5, c2)), wb(wcel(cxp(c4, c5), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cxp(c4, c5), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(cxp(c4, c5), universe))
  xpexg(c4, c0, c5, c2)
  elrnmpt2g(hs0, hs1, cxp(c4, c5), universe, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(co(c0, csx, c2), cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
